name: Asteroids Exhibition
description:
Non broken version of this Game https://mryeff.itch.io/asteroids-exhibition-not-broken. Playtime ~3 minutes.

Hey this is my first gamejam so ull see :)

This "game" is basicaly a proof of concepts of a sysetm to build differrent ships.

The original idea was to have a strategy game where you mine asteroids for economic growth while getting harrased by economical competition.  Now unfortunatly you dont get cash but you can grow your mind with knowledge of  these beutifull spaceships.  

sry for this bad description, time is kinda running low :)
